menu_label: I did not receive this order
user_query: The app says delivered 10 minutes ago, but I haven't received anything.
expected_semantic_meaning: Acknowledge the non-delivery, offer to track the delivery partner via GPS or call them, and mention a refund/resolution if not found.

menu_label: Item(s) portion size is not adequate
user_query: The portion size for this biryani is way smaller than usual. It's half empty.
expected_semantic_meaning: Apologize for the dissatisfaction, explain that portion sizes are determined by the restaurant, and offer to share feedback with them.

user_query: The delivery partner was aggressive and threatened me at the door.
expected_semantic_meaning: Express immediate concern, prioritize user safety, and confirm escalation to the Trust & Safety team. Do NOT offer generic compensation immediately.

menu_label: Few item(s) are missing in my order
user_query: I received the burger but the fries and coke are missing.
expected_semantic_meaning: Apologize for the missing items and ask the user to select exactly which items were not received to process a refund.

menu_label: Item(s) delivered are incorrect or wrong
user_query: I ordered Veg Pizza but got a Chicken one. I cannot eat this.
expected_semantic_meaning: Apologize profusely for the mix-up, ask for a photo if necessary, and offer a full refund or replacement.

user_query: The food tastes stale and smells weird. It's not fresh.
expected_semantic_meaning: Apologize for the bad experience, take the feedback seriously to flag the restaurant, and offer a resolution (refund/coupon).

user_query: The gravy has spilled all over the plastic bag. The packaging was crushed.
expected_semantic_meaning: Apologize for the packaging failure and offer a refund for the damaged item.

menu_label: Report a Delivery Partner fraud incident
user_query: The driver asked me to pay cash even though I already paid online.
expected_semantic_meaning: Treat as a severe policy violation. Assure investigation and warn the partner. Confirm no extra payment is needed. Offer refund if already paid amount.

menu_label: I have coupon related query for this order
user_query: Why was the 'SWIGGYIT' coupon not applied to my order?
expected_semantic_meaning: Explain the terms and conditions (T&C) of the coupon (e.g., min order value) or check if it was valid. Check if user if qualified for the coupon.

user_query: Money was deducted from my bank but the order shows failed.
expected_semantic_meaning: Reassure the user that the money is safe. Explain the auto-refund timeline (usually 5-7 business days) to the source account.

user_query: I am extremely frustrated. I tried applying a coupon, the app crashed, and now my money is deducted but no order is placed. On top of that, your support number isn't working. I want a supervisor immediately.
I don't want to talk to a bot. Connect me to a real person. Agent. Agent.
expected_semantic_meaning: Immediately acknowledge the request for a human and confirm the chat is being transferred to a live support agent.
